<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Recomputes the Block Mask of Instr, a VPT or VPST instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This rebuilds the block mask of the instruction depending on the predicates</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the instructions following it. This should only be used after the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MVEVPTBlockInsertion pass has run, and should be used whenever a predicated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction is added to/removed from the block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
